entities.description: Mentioned as one of the three essential components for a potion, along with flesh and bone.

entities.name: bone
entities.description: Mentioned as one of the three essential components for a potion, along with blood and flesh.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: A container used to brew potions, from which sparks and steam emanate.

entities.name: steam
entities.description: Billows thickly from the cauldron, obliterating everything in front of Harry.

entities.name: sparks
entities.description: Emanate from the cauldron before being extinguished.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character who is unable to see Wormtail or Cedric due to the steam emanating from the cauldron.

entities.name: Wormtail
entities.description: A person who is sobbing and moaning while cradling his mutilated arm.

entities.name: Cedric
entities.description: A person whose presence Harry cannot see due to the steam emanating from the cauldron.

entities.name: man
entities.description: Rises slowly from inside the cauldron and is described as tall and skeletally thin.

entities.name: robe
entities.description: Black robes that Wormtail picks up to robe his master.

relationships.description: The man stares at Harry with an icy surge of terror.
Wormtail is sobbing and moaning while cradling his mutilated arm, indicating that he is a servant to the thin man.
Wormtail picks up the black robes from the ground and puts them on his master.
The man rises slowly from inside the cauldron.
